data.text: @mhartnett01 @BBCSport I’ll remember that! 👍🏻
@mhartnett01 @BBCSport Which is?
@cjmrav @BBCSport Nightmare. Considering I got hit £100 for 53 in a temporary motorway 40 and he gets away with that. Rediculous 😤
@BBCSport This came as a surprise to 3%? Seriously?

@BBCSport Typical of this country that those with money and wealth get away with this sort if thing, when the nirmal citizen get shat on all the time. Beckham did not have the bottle to turn up in person. Scum bag..
@Markwor08193580 @PaClampitt @BBCSport I get your point @Markwor08193580
@BBCSport Bend it like Beckham!
@BBCSport Wonder how long Meghan markle was left standing in the queue at the immigration office to be granted citizenship! 🙄
@KaylumSCFC1863 @BBCSport 🤣🤣

@BBCSport It’s all about who you know not what you know. This will always happen in the UK. Certain people will always get away with things and money will go to the rich. The rest of us can’t do anything about it😡
@lucymunger @BBCSport Good morning
@captmikehitch @BBCSport Agreed but he does not care that much!
@lucymunger @BBCSport Still setting a bad example, IMHO
@captmikehitch @BBCSport Possibly more to it than just paying a fine! Points maybe.  Anyway it seems he likes to save those pennies where he can!
@Pye1977 @BBCSport Costa crimes
@BBCSport It’s absolutely disgusting! And here I am as a single mother having to pay £380 for my first ever fine! I was only 5mph over the limit...we can’t all afford “Mr Loophole! @DavidBeckhamOfc 😤

@BBCSport People need to wake up from his ‘nice guy persona’ and realise he’s just one of the many blurts with too much in the (offshore) bank that doesn’t give a damn. Top of the list come the revolution
@BBCSport Love becks.....but he was speeding,got done then  had the money and for off.....☹️☹️
@BBCSport Absolute tosser in this instance. Ridiculous spineless actions from a spoilt rich man. Not his finest hour by a long stretch
@dazzler180 @BBCSport Can’t argue with most of that. First I heard about it was today though

@BBCSport The Rich, Famous & Influencial making a mockery of the law & Our Country 😡 ... If you've the money & 😉'friends' !!!!!  Pay your dues #DavidBeckham, like the rest of Us... The Rich etc obviously think they're better, than the rest of Us 😠 F U 👊 Beckham et Al
@BBCSport All in it together!!!!
@BurkeBurkey56 @BBCSport But then he would be all "At least people are talking about me"
@BBCSport Money and right foot whips talk
@PaceyPete @BBCSport Morally doesn’t make it right ! Sticks fingers up to working class people , hasn’t done himself or his reputation any good imo
@dazzler180 @BBCSport Lots of money means expensive lawyers!

@BBCSport Pay the fine and take the punishment you daft prick! Just because you can get away with it doesn’t  mean you should! All the money in the world and you’re dodging a couple of hundred. Gone down in my estimations. What a twat
@KevinOxford @BBCSport Doing his job. Like he did for SAF. Is that illegal ?
@BBCSport @schoudshady His PR is in the toilet anyway,  all this does is add to his dwindling image. Hopefully he’ll disappear and take that miserable twat of a wife with him.
@BBCSport A true reflection of this person....49 in a 30? Accept you’ve broken the law and take the medicine.
@BBCSport Total disgrace. Him and SAF got off where others take their medicine.
@BBCSport Always thought of him being a decent bloke, thought he’d do the decent thing......

@PSween81 @PaClampitt @BBCSport If you can prove the notice arrived after the 14 day window, the law clearly states you don't have to pay the fine. That applies to rich and poor. The problem is in proving it wasn't delivered in time. Most people wouldn't pay if they could prove late receipt.
@BBCSport What a surprise celebrity can do what they like
@BBCSport Disgusted with the way “some” people are avoiding to obay the law. Fat wallets and fameous faces seem to do the trick every time.
@BBCSport He should have pleaded guilty and taken his medicine. It's not even as if it would make much difference to a man of his wealth to have to hire a driver. Any respect I had for him has gone.
@BBCSport Should have been prosecuted for loaning a Bentley. Nobody loans a Bentley.
@BBCSport That takes the piss. Like he can’t afford it. What a tool. Another person who thinks he’s entitled.

@BBCSport Thought he was more of a man, I used to respect him,
But now he’s no man who can’t take his punishment and is using his money to escape a few points on his licence even though he admitted the offence  Shame on you
@BBCSport Apparently if you have money, you can do what you want! 🙄
@BBCSport The law is the law . If he’d not been served the NIP within the time limit then its the Police / CPS’s fault . Nothing to do with celebrity

@karonpaul1 @mhartnett01 @Claretonmyshirt @BBCSport You would have  the same opportunity to fight that case and win on those grounds money has nothing to do with it this is incompetence it's an automated system spring for first class post and it doesn't happen
@metrologyUK @mhartnett01 @Claretonmyshirt @BBCSport Oh it is, it's called a solicitor.

@BBCSport Bad move for him getting off on a loophole thanks to expensive lawyers. Think the British public won’t like it, one law for the rich another for everyone else. I think you’ve blown your knighthood matey.
@BBCSport He was never quick  lol
@DanKing_92 @BBCSport No problem Daniel and can see that 🙂👍
@BBCSport That’s the knighthood gone for good.
@BBCSport Should be Knighted
@BBCSport This stinks
@ssmudhar1986 It’s the law. They only have 14 days to send you a Notice of Intended Prosecution by post if you aren’t stopped at the time.
@BBCSport Rules are rules 👏🏻. FTP
@DanKing_92 @BBCSport Don’t worry Dan , I don’t mind debate or to be put right unlike some of the snow flakes you get on here. 🙂
@DanKing_92 @BBCSport No problem Dan,but he should be punished like any other driver.I’m a fan of his and I know he’s not the 1st one to do this this. 🙂
@BBCSport What a low life A-hole. I hope the honours committee note this one..... Sir? Gotta be kidding!
@BBCSport How @Sedona_Red
@superdazlufc @Lorraine_3Sep @BBCSport Evening Daz 😀
@BBCSport The police must have been so starstruck ,forgot correct procedure & he gets away with it,the Law is an Ass!
@superdazlufc @BBCSport It will scupper his Knighthood 😂😂
@BBCSport He's a disgrace, he should have set the example he is always pretending to be and admitted it and payed the fine, had he hit someone would he still have got off?
@yorkierich @BBCSport #greatminds
@BBCSport Easy peasy change the statute of limitations to 25 years and fine him
@BBCSport Absolute joke. No matter the country if you have more money than you know what to with it you most likely get away with breaking any law, WTF!!!!
@keso13 @BBCSport I think you read my tweet, as it was virtually identical !
@mhartnett01 @Claretonmyshirt @BBCSport But he admitted guilt .!
@Petec890 @BBCSport Agree with all you said.
@BBCSport When someone sits down and reads all these tweets to David at bedtime, I'm sure he'll realise 'the boy didn't do good'.
@BBCSport So it's everywhere. I thought only in Nigeria law is applied to non-influentials only
@BBCSport He can afford endless tattoos but not a speeding fine? Shame on you David.
@rohit_nirale @BBCSport Nope...

@BBCSport Pleaded not guilty? You were caught doing 19mph over the speed limit. What if you’d killed a child? Obviously not man enough to take his punishment so pays somebody big bucks to get him off! What a poor excuse for a man!
@BBCSport Not really a Role Model anymore !
@BBCSport Absolute disgrace I hope in his case what goes around comes around and he gets caught and pays the price twice over 😡

@addythewise @BBCSport This is why he won't get a knighthood that the Sun are seemingly so desperate for him to get, single parent misses a council tax payment and the council will be all over them, he gets away with speeding. What will they do if he ever knocks someone over? Different rules for money
@BBCSport Just shows if you got enough money you can get away with anything, even if you’re guilty, this is what wrong with the law one rule for the rich and another rule for the rest of us

@BBCSport Motor offence law is stacked against drivers that cannot afford an expensive brief. It needs a serious review so fairness to all is observed and briefs like this don’t make the law look exactly what it is - a complete ass
@Reddevilfox @BBCSport Only invited to speed awareness course if speed maximum 10% over speed limit.  Anyone else auto points and big fine.

@ClaytonGreenman @BBCSport A mockery of the law? The Police failed to follow due process and serve a Notice of Prosecution in time. Pointing this out to a Court is not a mockery of he law. Quite the opposite.
@BBCSport Disgusted. Man up and take responsibility. You have lost my respect Mr Beckham
@BBCSport The elites are all in each other’s pockets inc the Magistrate
@BBCSport Scum bags both of them.
@BBCSport Well there goes your knighthood!
@BBCSport And I have to attend a speed awareness course for doing 35 in a 30 on a Sunday morning at 06:30! I'm fucking sick of these fucking cunts 😠
@BBCSport Maybe he had loads of points on license already and extra would have given a Ban.. ? Why else would you publicly fight ...
@BBCSport Money talks
@BBCSport Anybody else would've been banned from driving, what makes him different?
@BBCSport Fucking disgrace. If you ever wanted evidence of how corrupt this tin pot nation is, there you have it.
@Mackness2Gary @BBCSport The man is a fraud
@BBCSport Beckham is a cunt
@BBCSport That's what money can get you, tainted justice, Beckham thinks he's better than the rest of us,, he also thinks he can buy a knighthood, hope he's wrong.
@BBCSport What a surprise
@BBCSport If only he'd moved that quickly in the 2006 WC... We'd have been better off playing a glacier on the right wing.
@BBCSport @superdazlufc Why. 🤔
@BBCSport And i wonder why !!
@BBCSport David Beckham is a very lucky boy as Mr Loophole comes to the rescue. That’s breaking the law!
@BBCSport Large donation at the lodge later #cnuts
@BBCSport He gets a pass for life for that free kick against Greece surely?
@BBCSport no responsibility for speeding, just how can I get away with it,fucking weasel Beckham
@BBCSport If you receive a ticket - just keep it a few days like Beckham.
@BBCSport His lawyer cost WAY more than just accepting the fine and any points. What a prick.
@ChalkeyMc @BBCSport 👏😄
@BBCSport Wave goodbye to the Sir David title you so crave. Dodgers need not apply
@JackAnory19 @BBCSport Exactly!
@BBCSport Cheque must of finally cleared
@BBCSport It's who you know...innit?
@motoroffencelaw @BBCSport On a technicality. Now a test.
@BBCSport Money talks....🤬🤬🤬
@BBCSport Was the loophole, " I am famous so immune from prosecution"
@PaClampitt @BBCSport He got off on a technicality. I doubt if anyone else I.e. non celebrities with influence would have been as fortunate if in a similar scenario.
@BBCSport Bending the rules like Beckham
@BBCSport Man up and take your points Beckam.
@BBCSport Strange how people with large wallets can think they are above the law, whilst everyone struggle to make ends meet. Disgrace on the judicial system
@BBCSport Wrong. So wrong.

@BBCSport Yeah he's a big big figure
His tax in the US is massive..
If he were black....😥😥😥
Another story
@BBCSport Give this man a knighthood, no not numbnuts, his lawyer !
@JackAnory19 @BBCSport Most companies date stamp their post so maybe they had that and someone from the post room say it was late. Who knows?!
@BBCSport What a load of golden bollox
@BBCSport My man! 👏🏿
@BBCSport https://t.co/5cPdNeGa48
@kennysmart02 @BBCSport Good effort mate 😂
@BBCSport I hope he feels good a very rich person has broken the law and will carry on driving dangerously let's hope nobody gets hurt because of this leniency.
@BBCSport Gone down massively in my estimation .Someone of his wealth and status shoild have accepted it and moved on .Shame on you David !
@BBCSport I think Mr Loophole is every bit as guilty as these he looks after. Beckham has a family what if one of those were injured by a speeding driver ?, obviously it's ok now.
@BBCSport Not a case of what is right. More a case of who you are and who you can afford !! #stinks
@BBCSport I like Beckham, but he needs to man up and admit he was wrong.
@BBCSport Disgraceful not man enough to hold his hands up and hides behind his very expensive brief, got caught and ran home to the good old USA.
@BBCSport What excuse did your slippery lawyer use? I can use it to get off my speeding ticket!! NOT

@BBCSport What a great role model David Beckham is to young children. There is no denying he was speeding, but a legal loophole was exploited to avoid a measly fine that even a working class man could afford plus 3 points on his licence! Man up FFS!! #Beckham #Loophole #Disgusting
@BBCSport Does this really come as a surprise to anyone?
@BBCSport As a recent recipient of a speeding fine, it's FUCKING DISCUSTING!
@BBCSport I wonder what loophole would do if one of his family got hurt by a speeding/dangerous driver,
@BBCSport The celebrity loophole strikes again wish my misses had a great loophole
@BBCSport “it did not arrive in the post room of Bentley Motors Ltd until 7 February” - what absolute bollocks. Why don’t we just all deny ever receiving any speeding prosecutions? #blamePostmanPat
@BBCSport People would have have respected him more if he'd accepted his punishment rather than trying to get out of it like a snake...says a lot about him!
@BBCSport He had the Fergie shits?
@BBCSport He has done a lot for this country ,good decision.
@BBCSport This is laughable, if it was a normal joe they’d have been forced to pay the fine etc. It’s not like the guy is short of cash.
@BBCSport Disgraceful that he wasnt man enough to take the points and fine.
@BBCSport Shock horror.... Another kick in the balls for the police from Nick Freeman... What was his previous employment...?
@BBCSport Big shock as rich and famous person is let off.
@BBCSport Looks as though someone was half asleep in getting that notice sent.
@BBCSport Only Beckham can bend it(rules)
@BBCSport As a Statesman .
@BBCSport Mr Loophole’s magic wand!!
@BBCSport Caught doing 59 in a 40 zone and will not be charged. Mr Loophole making a mockery of the law once again.
@BBCSport He should of excepted he was in a wrong and gone on a speed awareness course like the rest of us, would of been good P.R.
@BBCSport Senior man
@BBCSport Course he won’t
@BBCSport He was prosecuted but has avoided conviction.
@BBCSport Bloody disgraceful, not the 1st celebrity to do this.
@BBCSport MONEY TALKS  🤯🤯🤯🤯🤯🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
